verses.verse: "To the angel <S%G32><s%> of the assembly <S%G1577><s%> in Ephesus <S%G2179><s%> write: <S%G1125><s%> "He who holds <S%G2902><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right hand, <S%G1188><s%> he who walks <S%G4043><s%> <S%G1722><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> lampstands <S%G3087><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> these things: <S%G3592><s%>

"I know <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> toil <S%G2873><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4675><s%> perseverance, <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you can't <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> tolerate <S%G941><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> men, <S%G2532><s%> and have tested <S%G3985><s%> those who call <S%G5335><s%> themselves <S%G1511><s%> apostles, <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they are <S%G1511><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> them <S%G846><s%> false. <S%G5571><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> You have <S%G2192><s%> perseverance <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> endured <S%G941><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> name <S%G3686><s%>'s sake, <S%G1223><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2577><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> grown weary. <S%G2577><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> this against <S%G2596><s%> you, <S%G4675><s%> that you <S%G4675><s%> left <S%G863><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

Remember <S%G3421><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> from where <S%G4159><s%> you have fallen, <S%G1601><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> repent <S%G3340><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> works; <S%G2041><s%> or else <S%G4190><s%> I am coming <S%G2064><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> swiftly, <S%G5035><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> will move <S%G2795><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> lampstand <S%G3087><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> its <S%G846><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> unless <S%G3362><s%> you repent. <S%G3340><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> you have, <S%G2192><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you hate <S%G3404><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the Nicolaitans, <S%G3531><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I also <S%G2504><s%> hate. <S%G3404><s%>

He who has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to the assemblies. <S%G1577><s%> To him <S%G846><s%> who overcomes <S%G3528><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the tree <S%G3586><s%> of life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3319><s%> Paradise <S%G3857><s%> of my God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "To the angel <S%G32><s%> of the assembly <S%G1577><s%> in Smyrna <S%G4668><s%> write: <S%G1125><s%> "The first <S%G4413><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the last, <S%G2078><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> has come to life <S%G2198><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> these things: <S%G3592><s%>

"I know <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> oppression, <S%G2347><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your poverty <S%G4432><s%> (but <S%G1161><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> rich <S%G4145><s%>), and <S%G2532><s%> the blasphemy <S%G988><s%> of those who <S%G3588><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> they <S%G1438><s%> are <S%G1511><s%> Jews, <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1438><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> not, <S%G3756><s%> but <S%G235><s%> are a synagogue <S%G4864><s%> of Satan. <S%G4567><s%>

Don't <S%G3367><s%> be afraid <S%G5399><s%> of the things which <S%G3739><s%> you are about <S%G3195><s%> to suffer. <S%G3958><s%> Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the devil <S%G1228><s%> is about <S%G3195><s%> to throw <S%G906><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> prison, <S%G5438><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may be tested; <S%G3985><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G1096><s%> will have <S%G2192><s%> oppression <S%G2347><s%> for ten <S%G1176><s%> days. <S%G2250><s%> Be faithful <S%G4103><s%> to <S%G891><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> you <S%G4671><s%> the crown <S%G4735><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>

He who has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to the assemblies. <S%G1577><s%> He who overcomes <S%G3528><s%> <S%G91><s%> won't <S%G3364><s%> be harmed <S%G91><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> death. <S%G2288><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "To the angel <S%G32><s%> of the assembly <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Pergamum <S%G4010><s%> write: <S%G1125><s%> "He who has <S%G2192><s%> the <S%G4501><s%> sharp <S%G3691><s%> two-edged <S%G1366><s%> sword <S%G4501><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> these things: <S%G3592><s%>

"I know <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> where <S%G4226><s%> you dwell, <S%G2730><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%>'s throne <S%G2362><s%> is. <S%G2532><s%> You hold firmly <S%G2902><s%> to my <S%G3450><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G99999><s%> didn't <S%G3756><s%> deny <S%G720><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the days <S%G2250><s%> <S%G1722><s%> of <S%G3739><s%> Antipas <S%G493><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> witness, <S%G3144><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> one, <S%G3739><s%> who was killed <S%G615><s%> among <S%G3844><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> dwells. <S%G2730><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> a few things <S%G3641><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> you, <S%G4675><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> you <S%G4675><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> some who hold <S%G2902><s%> the teaching <S%G1322><s%> of Balaam, <S%G903><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> Balak <S%G904><s%> to throw a stumbling block <S%G4625><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel, <S%G2474><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> things sacrificed to idols, <S%G1494><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to commit sexual immorality. <S%G4203><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> some who hold <S%G2902><s%> to the teaching <S%G1322><s%> of the Nicolaitans <S%G3531><s%> <S%G3739><s%> likewise. <S%G3404><s%>

Repent <S%G3340><s%> therefore, <S%G1487><s%> or else <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1161><s%> I am coming <S%G2064><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> quickly, <S%G5035><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will make war <S%G4170><s%> against <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> the sword <S%G4501><s%> of <S%G4750><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mouth. <S%G4750><s%>

He who has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to the assemblies. <S%G1577><s%> To him <S%G846><s%> who overcomes, <S%G3528><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> of <S%G575><s%> the hidden <S%G2928><s%> manna, <S%G3131><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> stone, <S%G5586><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the stone <S%G5586><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> written, <S%G1125><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no one <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> but <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> he who receives it. <S%G2983><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> "To the angel <S%G32><s%> of the assembly <S%G1577><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira <S%G2363><s%> write: <S%G1125><s%> "The Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> who has <S%G2192><s%> his <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire, <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> are like <S%G3664><s%> burnished brass, <S%G5474><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> these things: <S%G3592><s%>

"I know <S%G1492><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> works, <S%G2041><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> service, <S%G1248><s%> patient endurance, <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> that your <S%G4675><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> are more <S%G4119><s%> than the first. <S%G4413><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G3641><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> you, <S%G4675><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you tolerate <S%G1439><s%> your woman, <S%G1135><s%> Jezebel, <S%G2403><s%> who calls <S%G3004><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> a prophetess. <S%G4398><s%> She teaches <S%G1321><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seduces <S%G4105><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> to commit sexual immorality, <S%G4203><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> things sacrificed to idols. <S%G1494><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I gave <S%G1325><s%> her <S%G846><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> repent, <S%G3340><s%> but <S%G2532><s%> she refuses <S%G3756><s%> to repent <S%G3340><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G846><s%> sexual immorality. <S%G4202><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will throw <S%G906><s%> her <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a bed, <S%G2825><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who commit adultery <S%G3431><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> her <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> oppression, <S%G2347><s%> unless <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3361><s%> they repent <S%G3340><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G846><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I will kill <S%G615><s%> her <S%G846><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> Death, <S%G2288><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the assemblies <S%G1577><s%> will know <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he who searches <S%G2045><s%> the minds <S%G3510><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> hearts. <S%G2588><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G5213><s%> each one of <S%G1538><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> deeds. <S%G2041><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> to <S%G2532><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> who are in <S%G1722><s%> Thyatira, <S%G2363><s%> as <S%G3745><s%> many as <S%G3745><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> teaching, <S%G1322><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> what some call <S%G899><s%> 'the deep things of Satan, <S%G4567><s%>' to you <S%G5209><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> I am not putting <S%G906><s%> any <S%G3756><s%> other <S%G243><s%> burden <S%G922><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>
Nevertheless, <S%G4133><s%> hold that which <S%G3739><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> firmly <S%G2902><s%> until <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> I come. <S%G2240><s%>

He who overcomes, <S%G3528><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he who keeps <S%G5083><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> to <S%G891><s%> the end, <S%G5056><s%> to <S%G891><s%> him <S%G846><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> the nations. <S%G1484><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He will rule <S%G4165><s%> them <S%G846><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a rod <S%G4464><s%> of iron, <S%G4603><s%> shattering <S%G4937><s%> them like <S%G5613><s%> clay <S%G2764><s%> pots; <S%G4632><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G2504><s%> also have received <S%G2983><s%> of <S%G3844><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> Father: <S%G3962><s%>
and <S%G2532><s%> I will give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the <S%G792><s%> morning <S%G4407><s%> star. <S%G792><s%>
He who has <S%G2192><s%> an ear, <S%G3775><s%> let him hear <S%G191><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> says <S%G3004><s%> to the assemblies. <S%G1577><s%>"
